name: Motion
description:
Easily animate everything. Use avanced animation techniques. Share your design in any format: gif, mp4, webm, svg, sprites, frames, css, json.


Documentation

You can learn some basics of how to use the plugin in this community file

https://www.figma.com/community/file/966913921712314277


Bug Reports

If you notice any bugs, please get in touch via https://motionplugin.com/#contacts
